TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but nobody is really sure why they wanted it.

I wish for progress not congress

Wish might be granted, but you die to early to tell.

I wish for skyrim to work well with 220+ mods installed.

Granted. It runs in 240p.

I wish for teh lulz

Granted, you laugh so much someone thinks you are crazy and you get thrown in to the... place where they put crazy people.

I wish for i wish for i wish for i wish for i wish for KSP To update and this wish not to be corrupted

granted, the wish gets corrupted by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted, by being corrupted, by being uncorrupted.

I wish for a better beyblade launcher

Granted, the launcher now has a brain that detects the perfect angle... then it goes rogue... and launches a bayblade at your face. ouch.

I wish for pi.

Granted. It's a Pie Spy.

I wish the post above me didn't exist.

3.14160, sorry it is close to pi though...

I wish for an apple.

Well, seemed to worked. And I was planning on a spoiler... ): Anywho...

...

Yeah...

I guess guy below me I shall answer?

Anyway the apple falls on your head making you think you're Albert Einstein, and everyone you know wants to send you to an insane asylum.

Erm... Did the post above my previous post actually disappear?!?!?!

You did not wish!!!!!!!! RANDOM RAGECAPS!!!!

I wish the guy above me knew the difference between Albert Einstein and Isaac Newton.
he now knows the difference between Albert Einstein and Isaac Newton. he also knows everything about you and seals your credit card.

he now knows the difference between Albert Einstein and Isaac Newton. he also knows everything about you and seals your credit card.

*gasp* You broke the chain! You broooke the chaaaaaaaain!!

...Ahem. As your implied wish was nothing, you get nothing. Thus, you get skipped.

I wish the guy above me knew the difference between Albert Einstein and Isaac Newton.

Granted. He then tells you about every difference between the two you could possibly imagine, and never stops talking.

I wish I lived in a world where steam power never died, so that I could launch steampunk rockets to the Moon.

Granted, the liquid rocket is never invented though so the only way to space is via what the

.

I wish for the 90's.

Granted; a steel ball appears in front of you, and proceeds to violently fling you back through time to the 90's. However, you are dead on arrival due to the sheer shock of the situation.

I wish for sugar.

Granted, your heart is sugar

I wish I didn't have to change my username in Kerbal LiveFeed because of an argument ending with me saying I'd never come back

ANY outcome (except 1) is desirable for this wish, btw

Edited November 16, 2013 by 11JRidding

Erm... Did the post above my previous post actually disappear?!?!?!

You did not wish!!!!!!!! RANDOM RAGECAPS!!!!

I wish the guy above me knew the difference between Albert Einstein and Isaac Newton.

Did I really... (Should I just give up now?)

Granted, your heart is sugar

I wish I didn't have to change my username in Kerbal LiveFeed because of an argument ending with me saying I'd never come back

ANY outcome (except 1) is desirable for this wish, btw

Granted! Now you are forever in everything named: John Doe.

I wish for a game.

Granted, you have been entered into the Hungry Games. It's like the Hunger Games, but McDonald's always wins by making everyone too fat to compete. AND THEN SLENDERMAN.

I wish whales could talk in all languages... and knew how to use harpoons >:3

Granted. The whales extinct humanity.

I wish for TARDIS.

Here you go, you now have time, relative dimensions, and they're all in space.

I wish for the worst pizza ever.

Granted. I think that wish corrupted itself.

I wish I had something better to do today.

Granted, but you spill coffee on your computer losing everything.

I wish I had an Orange SpaceSuit

Granted but you are mistaken for Jeb and are put through suicidal flight tests.

I wish I knew what to wish for.

Granted, you wish for sausages and candle wax.

I wish I was a computer... from the far future just so I can keep my intelligence.

Humanity will destroy itself before than!

I wish I could fly into SPPAAAACEEE

Granted. You don't have a space suit... or a ship...

I wish I was British.
